title: I need help
body: About 40 minutes ago my League crashed and I couldn't open the launcher. I uninstalled, then redownloaded and logged it and was about to get into a draft game when it crashed. I couldn't play, so I tried closing League and restarting my computer, and now I can't log in, it won't restore the patch to the latest version, AND it has a "fixing itself" icon in the corner but it's doing nothing. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: It kinda sounds like the client might be scanning its files in preparation to repair or repatch, but it's hard to know without being able to see or with a better description. Could you shoot me a quick screenshot so I can see what's going on exactly, or you could try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a quick Force Repatch.

I ran the tool a few times, but it hasn't done anything. The first time it uninstalled it said it wasn't compatible with my version of Windows, which doesn't make sense because it's worked for a few months without issue. It did bring up that some functions needed administrator permission, so it didn't reinstall. I'd send a screenshot but I don't know how, so if you could tell me that would be great.

Ahhhh that one message you mentioned

" It did bring up that some functions needed administrator permission"

really tells me this is a kind of permissions error actually. Give the steps in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) a try and then try running that repatch for me. 

If that still doesn't help, don't worry too much about the screenshot since this seems to be heading in a different direction than I first thought. You can go ahead and hit up the techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your game logs. If permissions isn't the issue those techs will need to dive a bit deeper into those logs to figure this out.

I realized I wasn't on my admin account lol, that might have been the problem. Anyways, I uninstalled and repatched and it's now doing it's thing. Thank you for all your help so far, I'll get back to you in the morning.

Just kidding. It reinstalled but it's the same issue: "There was a problem during installation" and then "We're patching it up to the latest version." However, neither happens and I still can't login even though I'm online. I'm not sure what I can do at this point, I've reinstalled a few times and forced repatch but nothing seems to be working.
Now the repair tool won't work as well.

The admin account thing could have played a part, but I'd still wanna see how updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) go, were you able to run through those steps yet? If they don't help be sure to hit up the techs in a ticket for them to take a deeper look.
